sql_mapping.insert: insert into mo_object_type (name, created_date, modified_date) values ('#name#', '#created_date#', '#modified_date#')
insert into mo_object_type (object_type_id, name, created_date, modified_date) values (#object_type_id#, '#name#', '#created_date#', '#modified_date#')
sql_mapping.update: update mo_object_type set name='#name#', modified_date='#modified_date#' where object_type_id=#object_type_id#
sql_mapping.select: select * from mo_object_type where object_type_id in (#object_type_ids#)
select count(object_type_id) total from mo_object_type where #conditions#
